creator: Raven Bank
descriptionHtml:
Raven is the Ideal Digital Bank for Africa starting with Nigeria. Ideally, we provide digital-only banking services in very simple and easy ways that suit your everyday needs and remove all the unnecessary complexities that you are used to.


Why are we Ideal?

FREE TRANSFER TO ANY BANK
30 Free bank transfers to any Nigerian bank, you pay a flat 10 Naira transfer fee after exhausting your monthly free transfer.

MORE FREEDOM IS IDEAL
Zero maintenance cost, Debit alerts are free, Card delivery is free, we want to bring more freedom.

PAY YOUR BILLS WITH EASE
Raven makes it very easy to pay your daily bills because we are your Ideal bank, you don’t get to pay any extra charges for your bills.

SAVE AND INVEST LIKE A BOSS
Saving on Raven is actually a form of investment. Monies saved on Raven get you up to 10% per annum interest rate. You only get such a good savings rate from your Ideal bank.

BANKING SHOULD BE SOCIAL, THAT’S IDEAL
You can easily refer your friends and family to Use raven. Thence you can send them money for free forever without charges using their username, phone number, or account number.

PHYSICAL AND VIRTUAL CARDS (Coming soon).
You will be able to request a physical card and have them delivered to your home free of charge. You can create a virtual card with just one click.

24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT.
Raven is built to be swift and convenient, but if you ever experience any form of challenge you can get in touch with us via our live chat


Switch to Raven today,
Download the app and enjoy ideal freedom.
descriptionShort: The Ideal Digital Bank for Africa

title: Raven: The People's Bank of Africa

creator: Raven Bank
descriptionHtml:
Raven is the people's bank starting with Nigeria and throughout Africa. Ideally, we provide digital-only banking services in very simple and easy ways that suit your everyday needs and remove all the unnecessary complexities that you are used to.


Why are we Ideal?

FREE TRANSFER TO ANY BANK
30 Free bank transfers to any Nigerian bank, you pay a flat 10 Naira transfer fee after exhausting your monthly free transfer.

MORE FREEDOM IS IDEAL
Zero maintenance cost, Debit alerts are free, Card delivery is free, we want to bring more freedom.

PAY YOUR BILLS WITH EASE
Raven makes it very easy to pay your daily bills because we are your Ideal bank, you don’t get to pay any extra charges for your bills.

SAVE AND INVEST LIKE A BOSS
Saving on Raven is actually a form of investment. Monies saved on Raven get you up to 10% per annum interest rate. You only get such a good savings rate from your Ideal bank.

BANKING SHOULD BE SOCIAL, THAT’S IDEAL
You can easily refer your friends and family to Use raven. Thence you can send them money for free forever without charges using their username, phone number, or account number.

PHYSICAL AND VIRTUAL CARDS (Coming soon).
You will be able to request a physical card and have them delivered to your home free of charge. You can create a virtual card with just one click.

24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT.
Raven is built to be swift and convenient, but if you ever experience any form of challenge you can get in touch with us via our live chat


Switch to Raven today,
Download the app and enjoy ideal freedom.

descriptionHtml:
Raven is the people's bank starting with Nigeria and throughout Africa. Ideally, we provide digital-only banking services in very simple and easy ways that suit your everyday needs and remove all the unnecessary complexities that you are used to.


Why are we Ideal?

FREE TRANSFER TO ANY BANK
30 Free bank transfers to any Nigerian bank, you pay a flat 10 Naira transfer fee after exhausting your monthly free transfer.

MORE FREEDOM IS IDEAL
Zero maintenance cost, Debit alerts are free, Card delivery is free, we want to bring more freedom.

PAY YOUR BILLS WITH EASE
Raven makes it very easy to pay your daily bills because we are your Ideal bank, you don’t get to pay any extra charges for your bills.

SAVE AND INVEST LIKE A BOSS
Saving on Raven is actually a form of investment. Monies saved on Raven get you up to 10% per annum interest rate. You only get such a good savings rate from your Ideal bank.

BANKING SHOULD BE SOCIAL, THAT’S IDEAL
You can easily refer your friends and family to Use raven. Thence you can send them money for free forever without charges using their username, phone number, or account number.

PHYSICAL AND VIRTUAL CARDS (Coming soon).
You will be able to request a physical card and have them delivered to your home free of charge. You can create a virtual card with just one click.

24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT.
Raven is built to be swift and convenient, but if you ever experience any form of challenge you can get in touch with us via our live chat


Switch to Raven today,
Download the app and enjoy ideal freedom.
descriptionShort: Our only interest is in You, hence we give you the best banking experience

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

title: Raven: The People's Bank

creator: Raven Bank
descriptionHtml:
Raven, “The People’s Bank of Africa”, is a digital bank on a mission to build a financial ecosystem that caters for the banking and financial needs of individuals and businesses across Africa, starting with Nigeria.

WHY US?
With Raven, you unlock a world of banking convenience and enjoy:

LOW TRANSACTION FEES:
With Raven, there are no hidden charges to worry about. We charge a flat rate of 10 NGN on transfers, giving you the freedom to transact as much as you want at almost no cost.

BULK TRANSFERS
Need to send money to multiple people at once? With our bulk transfer feature, you can transfer to multiple across different banks with a single click.

TRANSPARENT INSIGHTS
Keep track of where your money goes using our spending insights. Know just how much you spend, and what you spend on to start budgeting efficiently. You no longer have to worry about maintenance costs, debit alerts and card delivery fees. We’re giving you the freedom to bank on your terms.

EASY BILL PAYMENTS
Need to pay your electricity, data, cable and airtime bills? We’ve got you covered all the way and at no added costs. And if betting is your pastime, you can easily fund your wallets with Raven.

HIGH INTEREST ON YOUR SAVINGS
We want to help you secure your financial future, and our savings feature puts you right on track. That’s not all; you enjoy up to 14% interest per annum on your savings, think of this as an investment for the future. All you have to do is choose a savings plan that works for you.

SOCIAL BANKING AT NO COST
Get your people set up on Raven and build your community seamlessly. Send money to your friends and family without charges using our Username transfer feature.

PHYSICAL & VIRTUAL CARDS
With just one click, you can create a virtual card that allows you to shop and pay bills from anywhere in the world. And soon, you can request a physical card and have it delivered to your home at no cost.

GLOBAL ACCOUNTS
Receive money from your friends and your clients abroad using our global account feature which is soon to be launched. Bank conveniently across borders with no limits.

24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Have any questions or need some help? You can reach our customer support team 24/7 via the live chat feature in-app.

Choose the fast, safe & reliable banking partner; choose Raven!
Download the app today.

All Deposits Are Insured By The Nigerian Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC). Raven is powered by Beststar MFB a Licensed MF Bank by the Central Bank Of Nigeria. “Raven” and “RavenBank” are trademarks of Ravenpay LTD.
descriptionShort: With Raven, you unlock a world of banking convenience

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to Raven Payverse 2.0!!
It's an all-new personal banking experience with the new Raven.
